verses.verse: I will extol<WH7311> you<WH3068>, O Lord; for you have lifted me up<WH1802>, and have not made my foes<WH341> to rejoice over me<WH8055>.
O Lord<WH3068> my God<WH430>, I cried<WH7768> unto you<WH7495>, and you have healed me.
O Lord<WH3068>, you have brought up<WH5927> my soul<WH5315> from the grave<WH7585>: you have kept me alive<WH2421>, that I should not go down<WH3381> to the pit<WH953>.
Sing<WH2167> unto the Lord<WH3068>, O you saints<WH2623> of his<WH3034>, and give thanks at the memory<WH2143> of his holiness<WH6944>.
For his anger<WH639> endures but a moment<WH7281>; in his favor<WH7522> is life<WH2416>: weeping<WH1065> may endure<WH3885> for a night<WH6153>, but joy<WH7440> comes in the morning<WH1242>.
And in my prosperity<WH7959> I said<WH559>, I shall never<WH5769> be moved<WH4131>.
Lord<WH3068>, by your favor<WH7522> you have made my mountain<WH2042> to stand<WH5975> strong<WH5797>: you did hide<WH5641> your face<WH6440>, and I was troubled<WH926>.
I cried<WH7121> to you<WH3068>, O Lord; and unto the Lord<WH3068> I made supplication<WH2603>.
What profit<WH1215> is there in my blood<WH1818>, when I go down<WH3381> to the pit<WH7845>? Shall the dust<WH6083> praise<WH3034> you<WH5046>? shall it declare your truth<WH571>?
Hear<WH8085>, O Lord<WH3068>, and have mercy<WH2603> upon me<WH3068>: Lord, be you my helper<WH5826>.
You have turned<WH2015> for me my mourning<WH4553> into dancing<WH4234>: you have put off<WH6605> my sackcloth<WH8242>, and girded<WH247> me with gladness<WH8057>;
To the end that my glory<WH3519> may sing<WH2167> praise to you<WH1826>, and not be silent. O Lord<WH3068> my God<WH430>, I will give thanks<WH3034> unto you for ever<WH5769>.
